{"id":477195395,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1617703305,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/477195395/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Operations to Make Array Equal","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minOperations(int n) {\n        if (n == 1) return 0;\n        int half = n / 2;\n        int sm = (half * (1 + getVal(half - 1))) / 2;\n        int halfVal = getVal(half);\n        if (n % 2 == 0) {\n            halfVal = (halfVal + getVal(half - 1)) / 2;\n        }\n        return (halfVal * half) - sm;\n    }\n    int getVal(int num) {\n        return (2 * num) + 1;\n    }\n};\n","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-operations-to-make-array-equal"}
